item.title: pictures and photography 2
item.description: remember how last time i talked about photography i mentioned i may one day get a camera of my own? well, it happened. sanukiseimen udon, at mitsuwa arlington heights. i got a minolta x-570, a camera made in 1983 as a low-cost alternative to the x-700. it is revered for its strictly manual capabilities and its good-for-its-time functioning lightmeter.

item.title: pictures and photography
item.description: we all go on random youtube binges right? the ones where it’s a topic that you’ve briefly touched in the past, and you never got fully into but seemed interesting at the time. one of those for me is professional photography. as someone who has done a fairly minimal amount of research into the more detailed parts of the workflow of it all, f numbers, apertures, shooting speeds, lens sizes, digital and film,
